statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 15.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, unit_price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 19.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 200
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET order_date = '2022-06-30 12:00:00' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE orders SET total_price = quantity * price, quantity = quantity - 1, order_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = 2002;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York', contact_email = 'info@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 456;
UPDATE products SET price = price + 10.00, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New Location', contact_email = 'newemail@example.com', supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 456;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = 15, status = 'Shipped' WHERE id = 2002;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1 AND warehouse_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York', name = 'ABC Company' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = 29.99, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 2;
